summary: Iteration 10 - Customization Page Testing: Fixed critical bug in Create Report dialog (empty SelectItem value causing React crash). All 6 tabs and features now working correctly.

bugs_fixed.issue: Create Report dialog crashed due to empty string value in SelectItem for Chart Type
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed <SelectItem value=""> to <SelectItem value="none"> for 'No chart' option

context_for_next_testing_agent: Customization page fully functional with 6 tabs: Custom Fields, Report Builder, Email Templates, Notifications, API Docs, Import/Export. All dialogs working correctly after fix.

customization_page_load.details: Page loads with title 'Customization & Extensions' and all 6 quick cards visible

quick_cards.details: All 6 quick cards present and clickable: Custom Fields, Report Builder, Email Templates, Notifications, API Access, Data Import/Export

report_builder_tab.details: Report Builder tab shows 'Create Report' button. Dialog opens with Report Name, Module selector, Description, Select Columns (clickable badges), Chart Type dropdown, Cancel and Create Report buttons

email_templates_tab.details: Shows 4 predefined templates: Welcome Email, Invoice Email, Payment Reminder, Order Confirmation. Add Template button present

notifications_tab.details: Shows 4 notification rules: Low Stock Alert, Payment Overdue, New Lead Assigned, Work Order Completed. Add Rule button present

api_docs_tab.details: Shows API Documentation with Base URL, Authentication info, Available Endpoints list, Open Swagger UI button, Copy Base URL button

import_export_tab.details: Shows Import Data and Export Data sections with navigation links to Bulk Import and Reports. Supported Import Formats listed

card_tab_switching.details: Clicking quick cards correctly switches to corresponding tabs
